title: Knife, ca. 1800
markings: On blade: CAEN, vase-shaped mark with crown on top
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Blade has straight upper edge, tapering towards the point. Drop bolster, handle flaring towards the end, decorated on front and back with tortoise- shell, inlaid with silver decorative pattern: scrolls, scallops, acanthus leaves, a squirrel and a man in costume in one side; a bird and a nude figure on the reverse.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Steel, tortoise-shell, silver, wood. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-106.
